We present all the daily happenings from the news makers of Pakistan right here on a single platform for your ease of access. description: Only app on Google Play with ALL Melbourne Traffic Cams! Traffic web cams for commuters in Melbourne, Australia. Ready to head home and you want to check the traffic? Live Traffic Melbourne is the fastest way to get to the traffic web cams that matter to you. Instead of browsing to a web site and working your way through the menus and map graphics to find a web camera just open Live Traffic Melbourne on your android and go straight to the camera you want with one click. Navigate through the other cameras along your route, in order, with a simple Next button. Should I stay or should I go? The traffic is slowing to a crawl. Is it going to clear quickly or is it time to bail and find a better route? Open Live Traffic Melbourne, select the nearest camera with one click and then navigate through the web cams along your route to see how far the congestion continues. Cameras are maintained by VicRoads. Individual cameras may be inoperative due to weather conditions or maintenance requirements.

description: Outdoor Atlas is thought to be the companion for all your outdoor activities. It supports you offroad where classical street maps and navigation are of no help. With the built-in GPS, Outdoor Atlas always shows you your actual position on detailed topographic maps together with appropriate coordinates. The maps are downloaded once on request and stored locally to be used when no GSM connection is available. Currently, following maps are provided: ✔ OpenStreetMap ✔ OpenCycleMap Additional professional maps can be bought as In-App products. Currently available: ✔ Switzerland (swisstopo maps, official topographic maps of Switzerland incl. hiking trails, SwitzerlandMobility data) ✔ Germany (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Switzerland (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Austria (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ France (IGN maps, France mainland and oversea territories, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Britain (Ordnance Survey maps) ✔ Northeast Italy (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Mallorca (Alpstein, available in app-internal shop) ✔ North America Maps (myTopo maps, installable as plugin) ✔ New Zealand (NZTopoMaps, installable as plugin) ✔ Spain (IDEE maps, installable as plugin) ✔ Norway (Statens kartverk, installable as plugin) ✔ Finland (installable as plugin) ...further maps to be announced. Application features: ✔ Supports internal and external (Bluetooth) GPS devices ✔ Supports built-in digital compass, respects declination ✔ Import / export tracks, waypoints in GPX or XOL format into internal database ✔ Built-in track editor, fully routing-capable ✔ Support WGS84, UTM, OSGrid, TM35FIN and LV03 coordinates ✔ Download map tiles once and use them offline ✔ Moving-Map mode (keep your position always centered on the screen) ✔ Search geolocations by names and address ✔ Retrieve geoinformation for position ✔ Use favorites to quickly jumpt to specific map, position, scale & layer ✔ TrackLog recording in background ✔ Follow-route mode (useful when visibility is bad) ✔ Goto-Waypoint mode (useful for geo-caching to find exact location) ✔ Infopanel shows you up-to-date information about position, tracklog and waypoint parameters ✔ Browse through the tour database with over 30'000 suggestions for outdoor adventures(hiking, cycling, mountain biking, inline skating, mountaineering, jogging etc.) in the Alps incl. tracks and desciptions. ✔ Browse tour reports from hikr.org ✔ In-App Shop to buy professional maps and app extensions (plugins) ✔ Synchronize your local track data with your favorite web portal, currently supported are SchweizMobil, outdooractive and gpsies.com Additional functionality can be added to Outdoor Atlas via its plugin-mechanism. Following plugins are currently available in the app's internal shop: ✔ Weather data CH (online weather data of Switzerland) ✔ Skiroutes CH (offline database of ski- and snowshoeroutes of the Swiss Alpine Club (SAC)) ✔ Wildlife protection Area CH (offline database with all protection areas in Switzerland) ✔ Swiss Public Transport Stations (Stations and timetable of Switzerland's public transport network) ✔ SwissNames (toponymy database containing all names from the Swiss topographic maps). This is a free app, but has ads on the map display. If you like to use an ad-free version, then buy the a PRO-licence in the app's internal shop. It will also activate valuable additional features. Please help to improve the product and report any problems to outdoor.atlas@corridor5.ch .

description: Get the wallpapers you always wanted in the easiest way! Just write what you want to see in your wallpaper, and this live wallpaper will download online images automatically! Write anything! The name of your favourite artist, sport, city or whatever you like, and see the images appear one after another. Every image you want, in just one live wallpaper. And the best part is... this app downloads really fast, as images will be downloaded later from internet when needed (and that's very fast too!) You can also decide if you want the wallpaper to update only using Wi-Fi or with any internet connection type (Using 3G/4G connections may have a cost, but you can avoid it updating with Wi-Fi only). You can setup how fast images will update, add great decoration effects, choose different size options and much more! Smart image fitting technology will make all images look great in any screen size! Try it! If you love this wallpaper as we do, you can download PRO version, including even more features. Images are downloaded from public websites directly to your device as needed, but images may have copyright, please check for licenses before using them.

description: Use your Android device as a remote for your Windows PC - Control the mouse, keyboard, media, presentations and more! The Remote Control Collection is a compilation of remotes, which you can use to wirelessly control your Windows PC. The unified remotes enable you to control the PC beyond mouse and keyboard! What others say: DotTech.org: Very responsive and very convenient to use Chip.de: Solid application with brilliant simplicity UnlockPWD.com: There are many remotes out there, this one is on another level Android-User.de: Setting up this app is a no-brainer TomsGuide.com: Top app for controlling your PC Included remote controls are: -Mouse -Keyboard -Live Screen (Pro) -Media Player (Pro) -Slideshows (Pro) -Speech Recognition Mouse Remote Imagine your PC’s touchpad right on your Android device. Multitouch gestures like scrolling and zooming are supported. You can toggle the keyboard to send keys at the same time. Keyboard Remote Use the physical or virtual Android keyboard to type characters and they will appear on your PC. Important keys like Windows, Escape and Control are also available. Live Screen Remote See your PC's screen live right on your Android device and control the mouse in real time. Media Remote Control the media player of your choice! Supported are Windows Media Player, iTunes, VLC, Media Monkey, Songbird and more. Slideshow Remote Control your slideshows directly from your smartphone! The screen of your PC will be transmitted to your smartphone in real time! That works with Powerpoint, Impress and Adobe Reader, Windows Media Center and more. Speech recognition Simply say what you want to be typed on your PC. You can also use voice commands to control your PC's media, e.g. "skip this track" or "turn the volume up". Android Wear Support You can now control your PC directly from your wrist! Super handy for presentations or controlling a media player. Much more The Remote Control Server is open source and can be used to control any device in your network. You can use this app to control all your internet of things (IOT) ready devices - like Arduino, Raspberry Pi and so on. To receive the commands from the Remote Control App, you will need the Remote Control Server. You can download it for free from: http://server.android-remote.com If you have trouble setting up a connection, follow this step-by-step guide or watch the video tutorial at: http://setup.android-remote.com/ Facebook fans can test the pro version for free: http://facebook.com/RemoteControlApps Permissions: Network communication For creating network sockets and using custom network protocols to connect with the pc. Phone calls Is needed to create a unique device id. Used to verify purchases and register unlock codes. Vibration For haptic feedback.
release_text: - Custom keys support - Improved desktop performance - Added low-performance modes - Network optimization - Hardware optimization - Added haptic feedback preference

description: Apple 1 emulator

Project which offers an action to pick a bluetooth device. Exposes the action PICK_BLUETOOTH_DEVICE to start the BluetoothDeviceListActivity which scans for Bluetooth Devices, shows them in a ListActivity and returns device info when a device is selected by the user. This is done to deduplicate code between APPs - the code is graduated from the DUBwise Project and used in the upcomming DUBwise for UAVTalk APP. The APP uses the lib tracedroid to be able to send debug logs when problems arise and android-bluetooth ( http://android-bluetooth.googlecode.com ) to be able to work with Android <2.0 which has no native Bluetooth-API The code is GPLv3

description: Are you on the lookout for not just a good, but a great Android Twitter client? If so, prepare yourself for a gorging of Twitter fuelled, Ice Cream Sandwich inspired goodness! Some notable features of Tweet Lanes: ✓ The native Android ICS styling has been shamelessly applied to Tweet Lanes, which makes for the most beautiful Twitter client available on Android. ✓ Designed and engineered to adhere strictly to the Android Design guidelines. ✓ Fully embraces the Android swipe controls. ✓ VolScroll™ - Use the hardware volume buttons to quickly navigate your feed. Very handy on larger phones such as the Galaxy Nexus and Galaxy S3! ✓ Interact with multiple tweets at the same time using multiple selection. Very handy for replying to multiple people in a single tweet or blocking spammers. ✓ Multiple account support. ✓ Automatically preview images and videos in your feed. ✓ Get ready for a new means of tweeting. There's no 'New Tweet' button here. Instead, the ever present Context Tweet Box will serve all your tweet-creation needs. ✓ The Twitter client Android power-tweeters have been craving. ✓ 100% open source on GitHub!
release_text: Full release notes can be found here: https://github.com/chrislacy/TweetLanes/releases Recent features: - Fix login issue. - Remove App.net support. - Large media previews & option to turn off media previews. - Added option to use display urls rather than full URLs. - @ username and hashtag autocomplete! - Notifications! - Tweet Spotlight - Lane customization - Direct Messages - Pinch-to-zoom on Image Viewer - Save images to SD card - Dark theme

Fully featured Call Manager with Dialer, Contacts and Infinite Call History Unlimited Call Log is the most complete and stable Dialer & Call Log replacement app . Important note : The app starts storing call history over the limit of 500 from the moment of installation. It does not recover calls that are not in your call history at the installation time. Take full control of your call history . No more 500 calls limit! Always have the entire call log available in your phone, ready to browse, organize and search. Unlimited Call Log key features ◆ Optimized database stores all your calls from the moment you install this app. ◆ Backup and Restore your Infinite Call Log ◆ By default, the OS stores no more than 500 calls. ◆ Browse, Group, Filter and Search the history. Instantly! ◆ Fast, intuitive Dialer with T9 search and Speed Dial. ◆ List of Contacts, Favorites and Frequent Contacts. ◆ Meaningful statistics, per contact and per entire call history. ◆ Fast switch between Dialer, Call History, Contacts and Favorites. ◆ Auto-delete call logs and insert fake calls ◆ Beautifully designed UI in lots of color schemes. Detailed list of features Infinite Call Log - Unlimited Call Log entries (Android has a limit of 500 by default) - Quickly Search all the Call History with an ultra-fast algorithm - Group by Contact, Date, Call Direction; groups are Collapsible / Expandable - Sort the call history by Contact, Date or Call Direction - Remove unwanted calls easily by selecting one by one or an entire group - Apply filters by entry type (voice call / text message), date interval or call direction - Quick actions appear if contact photo is pressed - Swipe left/right actions (call/text message) Backup and Restore - Backup your Infinite Call History locally or in the cloud - Dropbox and Google Drive supported - Restore backups to a new phone so you won't lose your previous call history Dialer - Quick search by phone number or by name using T9 keys - Speed Dial buttons (long press to dial) - Long press 1 to dial Voice Mail - DTMS codes List of Contacts - Have easy access to all your contacts - Quickly search by contact name - Navigate through long contact lists using the letter scroll - Quick actions pop if you tap the contact’s photo - Swipe left/right actions (voice call/text message) Favorites - Large Contact Photos - Long Press to Call - Tap once for Quick Actions - Favorites group and Frequently called contacts Special Features - delete call log immediately after call ended for specified contacts - create fake calls into your history Other - Display relevant statistics for each user or for the entire call history - Export log to CSV or XML file formats - Choose from multiple eye-catching color schemes We’re also offering our users great support and we always look forward to improve our products based on our customers’ feedback. So feel free to contact us or send any inquiries to relayapps@gmail.com . Visit the product’s home page: http://www.softrelay.ro/ucl/ Visit our company's website: http://www.softrelay.ro/
release_text: Version 3.1: - Smart T9 Dialer improvements - Speed improvements - Bug fixing Version 3.0: - Improved user interface - Extra features now available, enable them in Settings: *Fake Call: add fake calls to call history *Audo Delete: automatically discard logs from specified contacts - Bug fixing Version 2.5.0: - Backup/Restore your Infinite Call History locally or in the cloud (Dropbox and Google Drive). description: Live through an amazing World War II air combat scene: the ultimate dogfight live wallpaper finally has arrived at your Android. Featuring over 45 airplanes flying and fighting in the sky you can be sure this war live wallpaper is packed with action and loads of fire. A formation of B-17 flying fortresses is on a crucial mission over the Pacific when is attacked by a fearless and vicious pack of the dreaded japanese fighter, the Zero! Only the brave heros on board of their P-51 Mustangs can save the day. Let the bullets rain! Choose your side and jump right into the action from your favourite point of view. This gorgeous live wallpaper give you options to enjoy the fight in various ways: *CAMERA: you can choose between the Hero camera, the Attacker camera, or a panoramic view that follow the closest fights that take place around the bomber aircrafts. If you are not sure or want to enjoy them all, you can select the random camera, which will automatically take turns over all the options. *DAY TIME: decide at which time this air combat takes place and decide between enjoy the clarity of a clear day or the spectacularity of a bloody dusk. What are you waiting for?, get on board and let the adrenaline rush throught your veins with the best air combat live wallpaper on the store, an authentic dog fight experience that you can't miss on your screen. Ready for tablets and phones! Original video capture of the program on our LTE test phone: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DOUzDN-sekc

Perfect math learning app for preschool, kindergarten and families! Aligned to most math curriculums, this education game makes learning numbers and math operations like addition and subtraction super fun and easy for children. On your marks - get set – play & learn now! GAME IDEA: Brave little Wonder Bunny needs your help! The mean Bunnisher has stolen the carrots and wacky vehicles from the Wonder Village. Can you help Wonder Bunny to get them back on a race track? Wonder Bunny is fast, but there are surprises and math learning challenges on the track. Join Wonder Bunny and his cute friends in a fun race for carrots and wacky vehicles! EDUCATIONAL VALUE Following most curriculums like Common Core learning standards, this app combines mathematics with fun gameplay. The game also provides a comprehensive learning analytics tool to monitor child’s progress and learning – with detailed information of mastered math skills and skills to improve. Praised by the players & professionals: -EAS: perfect 5 star rating! Educational App Store has awarded Wonder Bunny Math a perfect 5 star rating for excellent learning value. - Winner of e-learning competition eEemeli 2015 (Finland) "Excellent math learning game. Wonder Bunny games combine top-notch graphics, fun gameplay and excellent learning value. Definitely one of the best kids learning games. (Teacher, Finland) “This is a great game. My daughter loves it and enjoys the games. It has been able to improve her math while keeping it fun.” (Dad, USA) ”Our test player children love this colorful and cartoonish game. Wonder Bunnies cute looks and hilarious vehicles are appealing for kids. As parents we appreciate progress analyzing and reporting features. Cute and very educational game.” (Viihdevintiöt kids blog, Finland) “Let Bunny and his friends help your children practice math with cute, colorful, rabbity racing fun.” (Smart Apps for Kids) "Different levels of difficulty make it fun for both younger and older kids.” (Real Mom Reviews) KEY FEATURES -Customize your favorite Bunny and ride wacky vehicles -Play in beautiful Candyland and magical Polar World race tracks -30 visually impressive, colorful and cartoonish levels, thousands of math exercises -Easy to play interface: all you need to do is to tap on the screen! -Child-friendly and SAFE: No advertisements, no third-party links, no violence – just fun playing and learning. -Free to download and play PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to download and test: first 3 levels are free, and the rest of 30 levels, some game items (like wacky vehicles) and full mathematics learning report can be purchased for real money (in-app purchases). EDUCATIONAL FEATURES -Designed by teachers -Different math-learning tasks for 3-7 years old preschool and kindergarten kids -Thousands of math exercises following Common Core learning standards for preschools and kindergarten -Helps kids to learn numbers, counting, addition and subtraction -Several operators with mixed questions -Comprehensive learning and progress report with skill summary - including detailed information of mastered math skills and skills to improve -Quick links for specific mathematics learning subject helps teachers to link the game and their teaching -Fun learning rewards like wacky vehicles and costumes -This game is suitable for families, schools & homeschools Start the adventure NOW! Watch game trailer here: http://fantastec.fi/wonder_bunny_math_race_trailer/ Get updates and news first! Follow Wonder Bunny on Facebook & Twitter: https://www.facebook.com/wonderbunnygame https://twitter.com/WonderBunnyGame DEVELOPER Fantastec ltd. is an award-winning developer of kids’ educational games based in Finland. Our mission & passion is to boost kids’ happiness and create great value for parents with visually impressive and fun learning games. For more fun learning games visit http://www.wonderbunnygame.com/ Wonder Bunny games: Not tested on animals – tested on children.

영어신문, 이제 어렵지 않게 세련된 영어를 공부해보세요! 클릭한번으로, 또는 모아뒀다 한번에 검색으로 좀 더 효율적인 단어 습득과 해석에 도움이 됩니다. 조금 더 성숙한 언어 습득으로 초딩영어를 탈출할 수 있습니다. 1. 단어검색 영자신문을 보며 모르는 단어가 있으면 클릭 한번으로 바로 검색할 수 있습니다. 기존의 영자신문 앱은 드래그를 해야 하는 단점이 있었습니다. 이제 어려운 드래그 대신 클릭하세요! * 추후 업데이트될 예정인 영어단어장을 이용해 오늘 공부한 영어단어를 체크할 수 있습니다. 2. 숙어검색 여러 단어를 한꺼번에 검색해 보세요 ! 복수검색 기능을 제공하므로 숙어 검색 뿐 아니라 모르는 단어를 한꺼번에 담아 검색할 수 있습니다. * 영영 사전이 연동된 "영문 버전"의 새로운 앱이 곧 출시 예정입니다. 영영사전으로 더욱 자연스러운 영어를 학습해 보세요! 연동될 영영 사전 사이트는 현지인들이 어학연수 중인 학생들에게 추천하는 사이트로 좀 더 직관적인 영어공부에 도움이 됩니다. 곧 출시될 영문판도 많은 이용 부탁 드립니다. * 영어신문은 실제 사용되는 고급어휘들과 세련된 표현들로 이루어져 있지만 어려운 단어가 나오는 경우가 많습니다. 추후 업데이트 예정될 영자신문뽀개기 팁과 단어장을 활용해 보세요! [ 추후 업데이트 예정 ] - 현재 서비스되는 코리아헤럴드, 뉴욕타임즈, 네셔널 포스트 외에 "로이터 통신" 이 추가될 예정입니다. - 영어 단어장 추가 예정 영어단어 검색 후 바로 영어단어장에 저장, 관리 할 수 있습니다. (기한 미정) * 위 앱은 스마트 폰에 최적화 되어 있어 타블렛 PC에선 다소 UI가 깨질 수 있습니다. 양해 부탁 드립니다.
release_text: 원활한 어플 이용을 위해서 항상 최신버전으로 업데이트 해주세요 ! 1. 로이터 통신 추가(14.03.02) 2. 뉴욕타임즈 버그 수정 및 서버 복구(14.02.03) 3. 메인 디자인 업데이트(13.11.23) 4. 코리아헤럴드 서비스 중단 신문사 측의 요청으로 인해 서비스를 중단하게 되었습니다. 5. 서버 이전(13.08) 어플 업데이트를 하지 않으시면 9월 부터는 단어검색 서비스를 이용할 수 없습니다. 현재 제공되는 신문사 외에도 이용하시고 싶으신 신문사가 있으시면 말씀해 주세요. 추가 요청 주신 신문사에 대해서는 별도로 서비스 추가가 가능한 신문사에 대해 선별 작업을 하고 있습니다. 앞으로도 많은 관심 부탁드립니다. 소중한 관심 감사드립니다 :D

description: Zipping around the city just got simpler and faster, with the Meru mobile app. It lets you book a taxi cab online in one click and pay through the highly convenient Wallet for a comfortable ride. And now the Meru Cabs app comes with an awesome new feature – Carpool by Meru – it connects people looking for a ride with people offering a ride. It’s smart, convenient and cost effective. What makes the app so cool: Available in over 23 cities: Meru cabs are now available in Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Jaipur, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Vadodara, Surat, Pune, Kolkata, Chandigarh, Visakhapatnam, Bhubaneswar, Mysore, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Indore, Ludhiana, Coimbatore, Kochi, Gurgaon and Noida. * Complete travel solutions: Book a taxi cab now or for later and even for inter-city trips. * Payment options: Pay by cash or a host of Wallet options. * Multi Wallet: Meru introduces the awesome new multi wallet feature. Now you have so many options to choose from. We have tied up with the best wallet providers such as Citrus, PayTM and Mobikwik. Using the wallet is easy and convenient. * Track your cab: Track the real-time status of your taxi cab. * One touch booking: Simply open the app and click on ‘book’ and your ride will be on its way. * Your location: The intelligent GPS/GPRS in the app tracks your location automatically and also gives you the option to manually edit or select your location. * Book in advance: You can book a cab up to 1 week in advance. * Know your driver: Once you book a taxi cab, you get detailed information about your driver along with his photograph. * Feedback: Use the feedback feature in the app to give your valuable feedback, we’re constantly looking to improve our services. * E-receipts: Keep track of all your payments with e-receipts. Every time you take a ride, we send you an email with the receipt for the trip. * ICE: In Case of Emergency is an alert system that sends an SMS with your location details to 2 registered numbers. * Airport/Kerb Pickups: The next time you get off the airport, pick a Meru taxi cab, enter its number in the app and pay for your trip through the app’s ‘Wallet’. * Meru Genie: This is a more pocket friendly cab services that has all the frills of a regular Meru cab. Meru Genie uses hatchbacks and has a more economic fare structure. * Meru Eve: This is a unique service that employs only women drivers, and is specially meant for women passengers. Currently available only in the Delhi NCR region, but will soon be extended to other cities. * Carpool by Meru: Carpool is a great new feature in the app. It connects people looking for a ride with people offering a ride. Using Carpool is incredibly simple. If you want to look for a ride, all you have to do is sign up, enter your source and destination locations and search for the ideal ride. Sharing a ride is also very simple – sign up, upload your personal, car and ride details and share your ride. * Ride Share in Delhi: With the vision of reducing pollution and traffic congestion in the capital city, we have introduced a new feature called Ride Share. Using Ride Share, you can share your Meru ride with another person who intends to travel along a similar route as yours. By opting for Ride Share trip, you can save big on your trip fare. Just click on “RIDE SHARE” button and we will find a suitable match based on your source and destination location. Confirm your ride and hop on to enjoy an affordable and safe way to travel around the city.
release_text: * Introducing Ride Share in Delhi: Now you can share your ride with another rider who intends to travel along a similar route as yours. Hop on and enjoy an economical way to travel around the capital city.

description: WAYALIFE.com is a website and forum dedicated to all Jeeps and the Jeep way of life. Here, we feature videos, photos and trail reports from all our off road adventures. You will also find a great community of fellow Jeep fanatics ranging from the old CJ, YJ and TJ Wrangler to the all new JK Wrangler and various other models such as the XJ Cherokee, Grand Cherokee and more. Our Android App makes it easy for you to see what we?re up to as well as provide easy access to our forum, right from the palm of your hand. You can post up questions, read write-ups and reviews, upload photos, check out trail runs and stay connected with Jeepers just like you, all around the world. Install this FREE app and become a part of the Jeep way of life. We are looking forward to seeing you on the forum from your phone! More than just a Jeep - It's a way of life! You can find our site on the web at: http://www.WAYALIFE.com

description: This Berlin Travel Guide is your reliable and easy-to-use travel companion. Find directions with detailed offline maps, in-depth travel content, popular attractions and insider tips with this Berlin Guide. Plan and have the perfect trip! Book your hotel and enjoy restaurant reviews and shared user content. Here is why 15+million travelers love Ulmon Offline & City Guides: Didn’t you always want to have an easily portable and compact travel assistant that allows planning your trips to foreign countries and cities upfront? So turn your smartphone or tablet into a digital Berlin City Guide and planner leading you through YOUR choices of restaurants, hotels and which attractions to visit. Enjoy recommendations and reviews of other enthusiastic travelers and tourists. Always keep your orientation and find the direction to the next place; completely without roaming and offline. With this Berlin travel guide you enjoy a wide variety of advantages: FREE Simply download and try this Berlin City guide for free. There is absolutely no risk, and we’re sure you’ll love it! DETAILED MAPS Never get lost and keep your orientation. See your location on the Berlin offline map, even without an internet connection. Find streets, attractions, restaurants, hotels, local nightlife and other POIs – and get guided in the walking direction of places you want to see. IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT Have all the information offline and freely portable. For each destination, access comprehensive and up-to-date information covering thousands of places, attractions, points of interest and many hotel booking options within the Berlin travel guide. SEARCH AND DISCOVER Find the best restaurants, shops, attractions, hotels, bars, etc. Search by name, browse by category or discover nearby places using your device’s GPS – even offline and without data roaming. GET TIPS AND RECOMMENDATIONS Find tips and recommendations from locals and tourists. Browse directly in the Berlin guide for the most popular attractions, restaurants, shops, hotels, nightlife places, etc. PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS Create lists of places you want to visit. Pin existing places, like your hotel or a recommended restaurant, to the map. Add your own pins to the map. Find and book hotels from within this Berlin City guide. OFFLINE ACCESS The Berlin Offline Map and the Berlin City Guide content are fully downloaded and stored on your device. All features, such as address searches and your GPS location also work offline and without data roaming (an internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels). DATA QUALITY: Map data and POI are provided by OpenStreetMap and are regularly updated by us. To check the level of detail, go to www.openstreetmap.org. The same applies to Wikipedia travel articles. DETAILED CITY COVERAGE Berlin, the capital of German has many interesting places for sightseeing such as the Berlin Wall, the Reichstag, the zoo, or the Brandenburg Gate . Using this tourist guide, its Wikipedia articles and the Berlin subway, you will not miss a single one! Ulmon, the makers of this Berlin travel guide app, are a small team of enthusiastic travel freaks in Vienna, Austria. We aim to assist tourists around the world with a portable planner, assistant and trip companion for their vacations and explorations. Enjoy your travels. Your Ulmon team! :-)
release_text: - COMPASS MODE - yeah we read your reviews and implemented the most required feature - Massive renderer speed improvement! - “Street name collision bug” is fixed. You won’t see doubled street names any more. - "Blinking tiles" bug is fixed. On some devices some parts of the map started to blink - not anymore.

description: Enjoy this fast-paced and addictive pizza-cooking game!   You have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to start your own pizza restaurant, make sure your customers are happy! Serve clients as fast as possible to earn money, add gorgeous and fun decorations before serving to earn huge tips!   As you progress in this fun cooking game, you will unlock new and special ingredients. You will create some of the most incredible, delicious and never-seen-before pizzas in the world! Are you ready to become a world-famous "pizzaiolo"?   In PIZZA, you have to be fast and efficient, but don't forget to add your extra touch and use your creativity. Choose from a variety of stunning food decorations and garnishes to express yourself and amaze your customers, so they will come back and buy pizza from you.   Remember, it’s your restaurant: you determine your own success. It's time to make yummy pizzas, download this cooking game now and become a pizza chef!   Game features:   ★ Amazing pizza-cooking experience. ★ Grow your restaurant, earn money and tips! ★ Crisp graphics and stunning animations. ★ Wonderful music and realistic sound effects. ★ Share your creations and achievements with your friends and family. ★ See your friends progress and try to complete the game first! ★ More than 30 ingredients and more than 350 levels = huge variety and fun! ★ It's FREE to play!   This is a great game for pizza, restaurants and food lovers. Improve your cooking skills and have fun!   What are you waiting for? Download PIZZA now and start your cooking journey!

description: Chris and Mathilde Stuart's eGuide to Mammals of Southern Africa is an interactive version of the popular "Field Guide to Mammals of Southern Africa". This app has many features that will enrich your wildlife experience in Southern Africa. NB: Please note that an additional download of 514MB is required once this app has been installed. Please ensure you use a WiFi connection to prevent additional data costs. FEATURES: * Each of the over 350 species found in the region has a detailed text description. * Most species have multiple hi-res photographs, distribution maps, animal-human size comparison, spoor drawings and skull photographs. * A few of the species also have audible calls. * Videos for select species. * Quickly find a species by looking up its track type, grouped with similar tracks. * A compare feature that lets you view two species at the same time on the same screen. * The ability to easily find a species using either common or scientific names and in taxonomic or alphabetic order. * A personal record of mammal sightings that can be exported to your storage card or email. * GPS location tagging of mammal sightings. * Uninstalling/reinstalling the program will result in the loss of your list; it is recommended that you export the list regularly to avoid any loss of data. We invite all users to share their comments and ideas on our forum at www.mydigitalearth.com
release_text: Fixed 'duplicate providers' installation failure bug Videos of select species added Many UI enhancements GPS tagging of sightings Instant search in listings Instant global search Gallery view in listings Wikipedia look-up in species display

description: Commission Tracker makes it easy to track your commissions and then transfer the data into a spreadsheet to create your invoices. It's the perfect Android commission tracker for business owners, managers, salespeople, contractors, realtors, recruiters and anyone who bills clients by commissions or who pays commissions to salespeople. Commission Tracker is designed for both employer and salesperson. -Employer can uses Commission Tracker to track commission payments for multiple employees or salespeople. -Salesperson also can use Commission Tracker to track the commissions from multiple clients or companies. ---Feature list:--- • Password Protection: User can set password to prevent unauthorized user to open Commission Tracker. • Currency: User can select one from 33 most used currencies. • Configurable first day of the week: The default first day of week is Sunday. User has option to change it. • Multiple Clients: User add, delete, rename client information. User defined clients are saved in database for future use. • Multiple Salespersons: User add, delete, rename salesperson information. User defined salesperson information will be saved in database for future use. • Multiple Sales Categories: User add, delete, rename sales categories. User defined sales categories are saved in database for future use. • Import feature: For information about client, sales category and salesperson, user can use this feature to import data from input CSV file to the database. • Database backup and restore: User can backup database to SD card, Dropbox™ or Email. User can also restore database from the saved backup on SD card or in Dropbox™. • Share database with multiple devices by using Dropbox™ • Export report in CSV or HTML format: User can export database to SD card in CSV (for Microsoft™ Excel, Google™ Doc Spreadsheet) or HTML (for web browser). • Send report: User can send report CSV or HTML file by email attachment. Report file can be sent to Dropbox™ and Google Docs if the apps for them are installed. • User Assistance: User can turn on or off the automatic tips on how to use Commission Tracker. • Auto Default Value: Previous used value will be used as default value for next data entry. • Tap to Sort: User can tap on the column header in Commission Log viewer to sort records by the selected column information. • Filter: In Commission Log viewer and Charts and Diagram viewer, user can click on menu button on the phone to get the display filters. • Install and run from SD card: For Android 2.2 and above, user can switch Commission Tracker storage location between phone and SD card by Settings-> Applications -> Manage applications -> Commission Tracker -> Move to SD card or Move to Phone. The feature is created to optimize memory usage. • Support 4 popular date formats. • Duplicate commission record. • Local auto database backup • Online auto database backup • More... ---System requirements:--- -OS: Android v1.6 or above -Physical Resolution: 320x480(HVGA), 480x800(WVGA800), 480x854(WVGA854), 540x960, 800x600, 1024x600, 1280x800 and other resolutions -Perfect for Android smart phone and tablet ---Things you should know--- • App developer doesn't participate in the purchase and download process, if you have problems with credit card authorization, charge, double charge, download failures, we have no way to help you, you'll need to check the Google technical help forum. • Update is always free, Google controls charging and it WILL NOT charge for update. ---Contact us:--- Provided by Frank Android Software @ http://www.softMiMo.com . Feel free to contact us via email. We have excellent support record and no question will be ignored.

description: With this application you can search people all around the world. You can use "Search People" to search people, search people on Facebook, search people videos, search people photos, search people tweets, search people emails, search people documents, search people on newspapers, search people on job websites. It is small, fast, and safe. It only needs internet permission.

description: Cars Trucks and Community Vehicles Puzzle for Kids is a fun puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 1 to 6 featuring 16 cartoon cars and construction vehicles such as race car, police car, tractor, fire engine, ambulance, garbage truck, bulldozer and more in 20 shape & tangram puzzles! When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with a variety of fun celebrations and interactions such as balloon popping. The fun matching activities help improve visual perception, knowledge of shapes & develop fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to match their holes. Perfect for preschoolers. Features • Kids Safe, please see our Privacy Policy • Original high quality cartoon art drawn by professional children's book illustrator • Four different vehicle groups: Cars, Trucks, Construction & Community Vehicles • Automatic advance to the next puzzle • Three different puzzle styles with increasing difficulty levels • Interface & touch controls designed for toddlers • Press & hold button to limit menu access to parents • Option to hide/show locked puzzles to prevent accidental purchases The first 4 puzzles are free, all of the remaining ones can be unlocked easily via single in-app purchase. Once unlocked, there are no further in-app purchases or other dialogs. PRIVACY POLICY We take privacy very seriously, this app: Does not contain ads Does not contain integration with social networks Does not contain web links Does not use analytics / data collection tools Does contain a single in-app purchase to unlock full version WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK If you like our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need help, please reach us at http://www.pixelenvision.com/support/ or by sending an e-mail to support@pixelenvision.com

description: Popular puzzle game Legor is back with 10 new levels, harder than ever! This time all the levels are unlocked on the beginning so you can choose which ever level you want to play! Can you manage to solve them all with the best score possible? Your progress is saved, so you will not lose already completed levels! Great puzzle game for whole family! Who will solve all the levels first? How to play: Simply press and hold your finger on the shape and drag it to move it, press and release on the shape to rotate it! Fill in all the empty slots! The game is highscored based so do not forget to submit your score to see who is the best! Features - award winning puzzle game - 10 levels - puzzle game for the whole family - global leaderboards included Please rate the game or leave some comment, if you want to support it, thank you :) If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com , we will be very happy to fix it! Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/ Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay

Wildcat Transit, UNH! Get real-time bus arrival predictions and the published schedule for Wildcat Transit, the bus agency serving the University of New Hampshire (UNH). FEATURES + Get real-time bus arrival predictions + Get your nearby bus/rail stops + Get bus route schedules + Favorite your stops so that you have immediate access to their predictions. + Favorite your routes so that you can quickly lookup a list of stops and get their predictions. + Get predictions from other routes that share the same stop all in one screen. + Simple, straightforward, and easy to use. + Route Maps FEEDBACK Please let us know of any feedback that you may have. Fast fingers game with a simple task, tap numbers from 1 to 25 as fast as you can. For a better game experience, we have implemented Leaderboards and Achievements. So you can track how you stand among other players and see who have better observation and faster fingers. ● Score sync ● Google Play Games ● Google Play Leaderboards ● Achievements from Google Play Games

"Photographer's Tools Free" is a mobile app for both Pro and amateur photographs with a lot of useful tools and features. This is free version of "My Photo Assistant" app available on Android Play Store. Following is a quick summary of what this application provides. - Ability to calculate Hyperfocal distance and Depth of field. This is a very useful tool especially for landscape photographers who may want an interesting foreground, distant background - and everything in between - to be in sharp focus. - Find Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset timings so that you can be at the location on time. - Find Moon phase information - Find golden hour, blue hour, civil and nautical twilight timings. Sometimes the best light is before sunrise or after sunset and this tool tells you how long before sunrise you may want to get to the location or for how long after sunset you can expect good light. - Calculate exposure adjustment when using ND filters of various densities. - Gray card tool for setting your custom white balance. Also useful for setting exposure.

description: NO.1 스포츠 음료 포카리스웨트가 만드는 자전거 라이딩 어플! 라이딩 기록도 측정하고 지도위에 그림도 그리는 GPS드로잉! 포카리스웨트 블루로드 앱은 자전거 라이딩을 위해 포카리스웨트에서 제작한 자전거 라이딩 전용 속도계 앱입니다. 자전거 라이딩을 위한 사용자 편의성을 중심으로 최적화된 정보를 쉽고 편리하게 제공합니다. [블루로드 앱 특징] + 회원가입 없이 누구나 무료 사용 + 자전거 라이더를 위한 속도계 및 기록측정 서비스 + 라이딩 기록이 지도위에 드로잉으로 그려지는 GPS Drawing 서비스 + 내가 탄 라이딩 기록을 그대로 저장하는 기록저장 서비스 + 다수의 저장 기록을 선택하고 기록의 평균값과 드로잉이 합쳐지는 GPS Drawing + 라이딩에 최적화된 UI/UX NO.1 sports drink Pocari Sweat application makes riding a bike! Riding measure and record the picture is painted on the GPS map drawing! Pocari Sweat Blue Road App for riding a bicycle made by Pocari Sweat Riding a bicycle-only speedometer app. Riding a bike is optimized for the user's convenience and information center provides easy and convenient. Blu-loaded App Features] + All free of charge without registering + Bike speedometer and record measurement service for riders + Riding drawing on the map is drawn record GPS Drawing Services + I just saved a shot record riding record storage services + Select the number of stored records and drawings, the average value of the merging records GPS Drawing + Riding optimized UI / UX

Preparation study guide for the Six Sigma certification exams. The Six Sigma Guide & Prep app is a study guide that helps prepare you for a position as professional who understands philosophies and principles, including supporting systems and tools, of a Six Sigma Black Belt. A Black Belt demonstrates team leadership, understand team dynamics and assign team member roles and responsibilities. Black Belts have a thorough understanding of all aspects of the DMAIC model in accordance with Six Sigma principles. Includes more than 700 multiple choice quiz questions and 700 flashcards. Includes glossary with common terms and definitions in ten (10) learning modules: Module 1: Six Sigma Concepts Module 2: Business Practices Module 3: Define Module 4: Measure Module 5: Analyze Module 6: Improve Module 7: Control Module 8: Advanced Six Sigma Elements Module 9: Acronyms Module 10: My Custom Learning Module The Six Sigma Guide & Prep app provides the basic knowledge of Lean Six Sigma concepts. Plus: - Create your own flashcards, multiple-choice and glossary - Send multiple-choice quiz questions to friends - Post score for global ranking - Keep up to date with latest news and articles with the Six Sigma news feed. Keywords Six Sigma, Black Belt Certification, DMAIC, DMADV, DFSS, Quality, Malcolm Baldrige, Pareto Analysis

Gangnam style dance performed by a skeleton! Best Wallpapers for best people! Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers Scroll down the list, find out the wallpaper and setup it. Note: It is live wallpaper so you can't open the app, you will need to follow the instruction above in order to set the wallpaper. Also slower/older devices (shipped with Android OS below 2.1) can't run it too.

Can you identify the Asian Country by name? Do you know all the countries and capitals in Asia? Test your knowledge of the Countries this Asian Country Quiz. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn the Countries as you play. Keep Score on how well you know the Countries. Choose from 2 different categories: * Country's Name - Try to associate a picture of the Country with its name. * Country's Capital - Match the Capital to the correct Country You can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct Country from 4 different pictures. * Choose the correct Country clue from the picture. * Flashcards - View different pictures of Countries to help you at identifying states. Includes a link to get more information about the country. The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.

Ad Free! ARTBus is a bus finding application made exclusively for the ART (Arlington Transit) system. The app allows you to input a Bus Stop ID, Browse a List of stops, view a selectable Map, and even search for Buses Nearby (using GPS) to view REALTIME bus arrival information for any stop. No more standing in the cold/hot/dark waiting for your bus. ART Bus also allows you to save a list of your favorite bus stops to easily access later. ARTBus now includes a widget! Add it to your homescreen for quick access to your favorites and the Bus Stop Number input. Please email me anytime for feedback: ARTBusApp@gmail.com This app is in no way affiliated with ART, Arlington Transit, Connexionz, or ACCS. from the ART website:"ART - Arlington Transit operates within Arlington County, Virginia, supplementing Metrobus with smaller, neighborhood-friendly vehicles and providing access to Metrorail and Virginia Railway Express (VRE). Most of ART's state-of-the ART buses operate on clean-burning natural gas; all have climate control to keep you comfortable and dependable schedules to keep you on time."
release_text: Fixed force-close bug experienced by users. Thanks for your patience! I've been in the process of moving and time has been short :)

description: Grumpy Fish - fun game nautical theme. It is a dynamic arcade game where the strong eats the weak. Collect bonuses, eat smaller fishes and become the ruler of the ocean. The game is available 3 modes: 1. To grow to a certain size. 2. Catch a fish of a particular type within the specified time. 3. Do not get hit. Eat smaller fish and get more. Grumpy Fish, it will not Grumpy Cat. Use special features and buy improvements to simplify your hunt for other fish. In Grumpy Fish There are several types of magic , which are bought for mana. Mana builds up over time , or it can increase the bonus of catching lightning.Funny adventures evil fish start here.

App for AlphaVision control panel The app for the AlphaVision control panel from Alphatronics makes it possible to operate your security alarm system remotely through an Internet connection. The operation of the app on your smartphone corresponds with the way you operate your security alarm system via the keypad in your home or office. The app provides secure access to arm/disarm the system, view status information and the possibility to control and maintain your security alarm system. Features: -Arming/disarming the alarm system -Access to the User functions -Access to status information The app is supported from AlphaVision ML software version 3.0 and AlphaVision XL software version 2.30 and higher. Older panels can easily be updated by your security installer to the latest software version to support the app. More about Alphatronics: The app is a digital product from Alphatronics BV in the Netherlands. Alphatronics is a leading manufacturer and developer of high-tech electronic security products in the Netherlands. The organization has been part of the listed TKH group since July 2010. Follow Alphatronics via Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AlphatronicsGroup

description: The All-in-One App for Fishing Now you can easily access detailed information on over 1,000 Lakes, Ponds & Reservoirs throughout Arizona. Get real-time Lake Reports, Weather Conditions and Best Fishing Times. Review and mark your favorite HotSpots, and learn tips, tricks and techniques. -------------------------------- Impressive Feature List: -------------------------------- ✔ Access over 1,000 Lakes, Ponds & Reservoirs ✔ Easily Search a Lake with only a few letters ✔ Proximity Search to find a Lake near you ✔ Proximity search from a City, Town or Lake ✔ View & add HotSpots at your favorite Lakes ✔ Share your HotSpots or keep them Private ✔ View & add Live Lake Reports & Feedback ✔ Books, Mags & More – Save for Offline Reading ✔ Solunar Calendar to show Best Times to Fish ✔ Real-time Weather Conditions ✔ 4-Day Weather Forecasts ✔ View Nearby Photos at every Lake ✔ Species Reference with detailed info & images ✔ Access to State regulations & license information ✔ View maps & get directions to every Lake ✔ Link to numerous resources ✔ Great Fishing Tips, Videos & How To’s Get the App that every angler needs and Fish with Attitude ! Visit www.iFishArizona.com for the latest Features, News, Coverage or if you have any questions or feedback!
release_text: Check out our new Videos section in the Essentials area! A few Kit Kat updates as well.

description: FOR KIDS AND ADULTS FREE The easiest way to learn is when you don't realize you are learning. Play Learn English teaches you useful vocabulary without you even noticing. Play each level, score points by choosing the one word from three for a visual clue. Play Learn English is a fantastic app for learning languages for adults and children. It is also an excellent tool for helping people with learning difficulties extend their vocabulary. Parents worried about the amount of time their kids spend killing birds or sweets can allow them to play, safe in the knowledge that they are learning something useful. Learn vocabulary: colors, fruits, animals, tools, household objects. Touch the moving images and choose the correct word in the three that appear. Get it right you score 1 point and the image disappears. Get it wrong you lose 4 points and it continues bouncing round the screen. You learn to recognize the correct words and improve your vocabulary.

description: A tiny bird with tiny wings which wants to fly to the sky needs your help! Peddy is a tiny bird with tiny wings, he wants to fly to the sky. But the tiny bird has tiny wings, so use gravity and terrain to help him fly to the sky. Compare to other flappy games, you have more degrees of freedom to control the tiny bird and play the game. Touch the screen, retract your tiny wings and gravity increases, you can get more speed. Release the screen, spread your tiny wings and gravity decreases, you can fly to the sky. If you see other tiny birds in your adventure, try to make friends with them, they will join you. The yellow ball is coin, in your adventure, try to collect as more as possible coins. The blue ball is gravity ball, it can help the tiny bird to get rid of gravity and fly to the sky. Have fun!

My Darlings is a very usable Live Wallpaper where you can set your contacts to float around on your home screen. Then, tap to the right to sms or tap to the left to call! Only in full version: Set up to 20 contacts, set any heart color and select your preferred heart size. Follow us on Twitter @CommindAB http://twitter.com/CommindAB

JezzBall is a fun, strategy ball confining multi level game, player's goal is to build the wall to confine the ball in minimum area and clear the rest of the area in given time. If player clears 75 percent area, he wins and crosses the level; in case player fails to clear 75 percent area he has to move to previous level. On win the score points are given, on failure the score points are reduced. for any query, feature request write us at support@tiddagames.com
release_text: * Updated ads sdk to use Google Advertising id.

description: "RedShift is very easy to learn and play, but its simplicity combined with its hair-raising cues help make it one of the better survival games on mobile." - Nadia Oxford, 148Apps "...as the clock ticks ever downward and the map grows larger with each new room and corridor, you realize that this isn't just a facility, it's a maze and you need to stay focused and attentive to succeed." - Christian Valentin, Indie Game Enthusiast Experience a suspenseful dynamic exploration race against the clock! Set in a power facility set to explode at any minute, as the last person alive can you prevent it from obliterating the city? RANDOMIZED LEVELS Every play-through is a different encounter DRAMATIC SUSPENSE As time passes the facility becomes more chaotic and unstable REWARDING CHALLENGES Tough but fair gameplay. You might not win the first time, but when you finally do you'll feel it NO FREEMIUM GIMMICKS Play a game designed for a pure experience, not for milking your money with annoying fake currencies. Follow Belief Engine! http://www.beliefengine.com http://www.facebook.com/BeliefEngine http://www.twitter.com/beliefengine/
release_text: Fixing a bug that would show debug info on certain devices.

description: Boudreaux's Louisiana Bayou Crawfish Hunt "Help catch some crawfish for mamma to make crawfish etouffee!" Boudreaux lives a somewhat idyllic existence playing in the bayous of Louisiana. But when it's supper time this hungry Cajun boy from Bayou Lafourche in Southern Louisiana is out on the hunt for some crawfish. Help Boudreaux catch all the crawfish he needs for mamma to make her famous crawfish etouffee. Similar in playing concept to the 1980s arcade game classic Whac O Mole or Whack O Mole, only Boudreaux's Bayou Crawfish Hunt has a whole lot more targets to touch. Game starts with level 1, touch 15 crawfish in 15 seconds! Game ends with level 20, touch 210 crawfish in 60 seconds! Laissez Les Bons Temps Rouler! This game is ideally designed for kids but it is rated E for Everyone. BOUDREAUX'S BAYOU CRAWFISH HUNT FEATURES: - 20 Progressively Challenging Levels! - Themed To Louisiana Cajun Crawfish! - Easy Touch Play! - Exercise Hand / Eye Coordination! Rated E For Everyone! - NO In App Purchasing! No Coins! Nothing else to buy! Just Challenging Family Fun! - No Special App Permissions! THIS APP IS AD FREE, CONTAINS NO VIRUSES, NO MALWARE, NO SPYWARE, AND NO ADVERTISEMENTS OF ANY KIND! HOW TO PLAY? To catch crawfish, touch crawfish as they pop up out of the ground, catch the specified number in the allotted time frame to advance to next level. MORE INFORMATION: For more Android Apps and FREE Help! please see our website: http://www.androidputing.com This APP is Open Source under the GNU License Version 3.0, license and source code are available at our website: http://www.androidputing.com Need Help? Visit our website for FREE App support http://www.androidputing.com Portions of this APP description were written with Wikipedia.org as a source.

Manage your video game collection and library faster and easier than ever with Game Keeper - Game Tracker! Organize everything, from the Amiga to the Xbox 360 and Wii U and keep track of your game library. Find everything you want to know about your video games and consoles! Never lose your collection with our backup system, find your collection's worth with our price database and get awesome deals with our eBay support! It has everything a retro gaming collector or a general gamer would love to keep track of their video game library. You can add games to your library automatically or manually if you, for some reason, can't find them in our database. - Main Features: * Many, many consoles and games for your video game library * Backup support (Import/Export data) to export your video game collection * eBay integration * Game prices with multiple currencies even for retrogaming collectors * Wishlists Keywords: games gaming retrogaming retro nes snes genesis xbox playstation nintendo wii game collection consoles game library game tracker
release_text: * Added multiple currencies support, you can select your preferred one on the Settings. * Added list viewing mode for the console collection. * Minor bug fixes.

description: Very useful app for students. The app lists all the important Calculus formulas. Derivative formulas - Exponential, Logarithmic, Trigonometric, Inverse Trigonometric, Hyperbolic, Inverse Hyperbolic, Different forms of Chain rule etc. Integration formulas - Trigonometric, Hyperbolic, Exponential & Logarithmic, Definite Integrals, Miscellaneous formulas. Let us know if you have any suggestions/issues. If you think any other formula needs to be listed, then do write to us at education.useful@gmail.com

Learn counting and the alphabet while finding out about wild animals, farm animals and identifying the sounds they make in this puzzling and fun game. Now with bonus memory training pairs game. `Kids Animal Connect the Dots` is the top new puzzle game for kids from the award winning early learning educational app developer recommended for young developing brain. This educational and fun App helps young children learn about animals and the sounds that each one makes while developing their hand eye coordination and stimulating their puzzle solving skills. It`s a unique early learning game with realistic sounds and photo quality pictures which toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarten age children will enjoy. The great thing about this educational game is that it intelligently develops a lot of skills at the same time. Young ones will start to develop their cognitive skills, hand eye coordination, visual spatial skills and shape recognition of different objects. Game Features: • high quality graphical images assembled against engaging scenes that look stunning on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones • realistic sound effects for every animal • covers most common wild animals that children love as well as some lesser known ones. For example cow, cheetah, sea lion, cat, horse, tiger, crocodile, lion, chimpanzee, hippopotamus, sheep, rabbit, dolphin, pig, zebra, rhinoceros, polar bear and many others. • puzzles that can be replayed again after solving • increasing difficulty as your child progresses through the games in three distinct levels • no advertising • bonus memory training pairs game Kids Animal Connect the Dots Puzzles comes with a selection of free games that can be easily upgraded through a single low cost in-app purchase to enable all puzzles. By upgrading from the Free App to the full version you’ll also be entitled to all additional puzzles and features added in future releases. Join the dot puzzle games have traditionally been a fun and early education learning tool for tots, toddlers, preschoolers, kindergarten, and early school age children and are as stimulating a game for girls as they are an exciting game for boys. • 2 year old and 3 year old children can practice their hand eye coordination and matching skills as they progress through the puzzles on each level as well as enjoying the animal sounds. • 4 year old and 5 year old kids can learn to read, write and pronounce the object names on completion of every puzzle (English only) We hope you and your children enjoy playing what we believe is one of best early education games for toddlers and preschoolers. This toddler game / preschool game is suitable for girls and boys, nursery school, infant school, preschoolers and kindergarten age kids. Ages 2, 3, 4, 5. Check out our other puzzle games and acclaimed kids educational apps at http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at http://facebook.com/espacepublishing .

Simply is the best-looking and easiest way to get the news you care about. Each screen is a smart summary of exactly one news article. Swipe quickly from page to beautifully-illustrated page. Simply tailors your top stories from thousands of news articles. You can’t miss anything important with Simply – and it’s fast and fun. Simply categories include top news, politics, entertainment, science, tech, and local news. You can easily define your own news categories based on search words that you enter. Thus you can easily get your individual categories. e.g for "Apple" or "London" or "Meerkat" or whatever you happen to be interested in. You can rely on Simply’s quality and performance. Award-winning apps by the Simply design team have been ranked #1 in over 30 countries. Simply’s top features: - 100s of robust sources examined to deliver comprehensive news - 600 British locations tracked to assure local news - 1,000,000 news articles analyzed monthly - Every news article intelligently prioritized - Clear, compact summaries generated 100% automatically from any news - Full-story news text presented in a single swipe - Personalized, relevant news derived from your search words - News repository stored on your device keeps you informed even when offline Standard Simply is always free. Extensions can be purchased inside the news app or can be activated for free if you recommend Simply to a friend. Simply users are saying: ***** Great app for news. Good information. Easy to use. ***** Many sources, impressive summaries, cool design. My start screen app for news. ***** Does exactly what it claims. Best news app. ***** That is a great news app that I use constantly. Website: http://www.pylba.com Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hio1ZPHWMtU Twitter: @SimplyNewsApp Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SimplyNews Questions / problems: feedback@pylba.com

Talking Caller ID Pro will speak the callers name or phone number for your incoming voice calls and text messages. This app will speak the name(if a known contact) or the phone number of incoming calls and text messages via Android's built-in Text to Speech (TTS) capabilities. Features: * enable/disable speaking for calls * enable/disable speaking for texts * custom phrases to speak before and after the name or number * set the rate and pitch of the voice * option to mute ring tone * option to speak for unknown and/or known contacts * option to repeat until answered If you have any difficulties please verify via the Android settings for Text to Speech(Settings->Language & input->Text-to-speech output) that your TTS is functional. Any questions or suggestions? androidtouchdev [at] gmail.com Thank you!

description: Need a five minute break at some point? Want to feel like if you were on the middle of nature? Or maybe you want just to have fun playing sounds of nature? Or Increase concentration? Nature Sounds Droid can help you with that. It lets you mix several nature sounds into one relaxing (or annoying :p) music. Choose the sounds you like between thunder, ocean sounds, sea, birds,... and make your own composition, feel as if you were on the beach, or go to sleep with some crickets sound. Features: -Compose your own nature sound -Play your sound indefinitely -Set a timer to play the music for a short period of time Usage: - Slide the bars to choose the volume of the different sounds - Once you created your own mix press menu to: - Play - Pause - Timer (play for a fixed time)
release_text: V2.0: - Added more sounds (whales, wolves, water, frogs) - Internal structure changes - New logo V1.1: - Minor bugs fixing V1.0: - Initial App

description: Movie Collection + Inventory Do you own a lot of movies? Do you have trouble keeping track of all your DVDs and Blu-ray discs? Movie buffs, keep track of your collection with this organizer. Manage your Blu-ray and DVD catalog along with your personal ratings and notes. Check which movies you already own while you're out shopping so you won't accidentally buy a DVD or Blu-ray disc you already own. Track additional information like loaned out status, location, number of times watched, etc.
release_text: - Added Movie Suggestions - Fixed opening crash - Added CSV Import - Fixed Restore bug - Many tablet fixes - Workaround for missing Tabs for Galaxy Note - Added New Background Colors - Added Blu-ray/DVD/Digital, PS3 and UMD to Formats - Added Average rating by category to Stats - New photo size setting - Backup to Server confirmation email is now optional -Restore/Import should now update a movie if the info is newer instead of always adding for those synching between different devices

description: A valid Pearson MasteringPlus or MyLabPlus Username and Password are required to access your subscribed titles on your 7” or 10” tablet running Android OS 3.1 or newer. To initialize your eText application, you must first use your browser on your Android tablet to sign in to your MasteringPlus or MyLabPlus course and select a link to your eText. You will then be presented with a web page that allows you to launch your eText title using the Pearson eText for Campus app. The Pearson eText for Campus app is a great companion to Pearson’s eText browser-based book reader. It allows existing subscribers who view their Pearson eText titles on a Mac or PC to access their titles in a bookshelf on your Android 7” or 10” tablet, either online or via download. With the Pearson eText for Campus app, book content is displayed with the highest quality fidelity to the print and online versions of the textbook. The Pearson eText for Campus app provides students and instructors with many of the same features available to web-based eText subscribers. The Pearson eText for Campus app provides full-text search capabilities, a notes manager, support for multimedia content, glossaries, note sharing and many other exciting features. Access to your titles:  To initialize your eText application, use your tablet’s web browser on your Android 7” or 10” tablet to sign in to your MasteringPlus or MyLabPlus course and select a link to your eText. You will then be presented with a web page that allows you to launch your eText title using the eText for Campus app. For subsequent access to your eText, you can simply launch the eText for Campus app directly from your Android tablet. Note that if you ever Sign Out of the Pearson eText for Campus app you will need to again access your eText using your tablet’s browser as outlined above to re-establish your credentials. If you are unable to access your eText titles through your course, those titles may not yet be available for Android. If you receive a message stating "Invalid Username or Password" and you've entered the information correctly, your subscribed titles are not yet available for Android. If you experience any difficulties accessing the Pearson eText for Campus app, please contact Pearson Customer Technical Support - http://247pearsoned.custhelp.com/ Features: • Bookshelf displaying your subscribed titles • Page fidelity to the original textbook display • Single page view (portrait/landscape) and two page view (landscape) • Notes, highlights, bookmarks on or offline with automatic synchronization • Hotspot links to rich browser-based media within online titles • Interoperability with the same title on a Mac or Windows • Text Search and Search History within online titles • Table of Contents • Glossary for select online titles • Page navigation via swipe, next/previous page buttons, Go To Page etc. • Pinch to zoom
release_text: This update includes some enhancements and a new feature, along with some bug fixes. The audio player can now be moved around the screen while it's playing an audio file, which enables scrolling and accessing other elements on the screen. The update also includes an enhancement that enables more secure interactions with an associated course and the Pearson authentication system. A new feature permits selectively opening a linked resource in a browser window instead of the default viewer.

description: local.ch is the official phone book app for Switzerland. The local.ch phonebook application helps you find private and business phone numbers and addresses in Switzerland. It identifies your location and allows you to search in your immediate surroundings. For example you can find your way to the closest restaurant, chemist or petrol station. To give the best possible experience we use permissions which let you make phone calls, manage your contacts, check your call history and see who is calling you. In no way we do anything malicious. Would you have any question please lets us know by sending us an email: mobile-feedback@local.ch . See below our required detailed permissions. Network communication: We need internet connectivity. Without it the app would not work. Services that cost you money: If you are starting phone calls from within our app, you must pay your usual communication fees. One might call this the second most important permission of our app, after network connectivity. Without this permission, it would not be possible to directly make phone calls from an entry within the app. Your location: We need to know your location so that you can search around yourself. Without this permission we would not be able to tell you where is the closest business you may be interested in. Your personal information and your account: This is needed for you to add and merge entries to you address book's account of choice, and for looking up entries that are already stored in your address book. Without this we would not be able to do that. Phone calls: This gives our Android users a unique feature, which is to tell them who is calling when there is an incoming phone call from an unknown number (a number which is not stored on your address book).
release_text: The phone does not stay muted anymore after a telemarketing call was detected. • The notification for call lookup goes away earlier. • Street numbers are back when you add an entry to your contacts. • Opening hours are now more easily expandable

description: This app contains 5 free fonts compatible with the FlipFont program that is installed on most Samsung Galaxy devices. This app is designed to be used with Samsung Galaxy devices that are using the TouchWiz interface and have the FlipFont program. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology. Fonts for Android Samsung Galaxy FlipFont Free have spent the last year gathering free fonts and creating Android apps to provide users with the ability to change their device’s typeface for free. Using the FlipFont font changer program installed on your Samsung Galaxy phone, you can use this application to customise your device to one of the many beautiful fonts that we have collected. Each Bundle of fonts is a random selection of 5 typefaces that have been optimised for use on Samsung Galaxy Android devices. Please browse through our many FlipFont packs to find the perfect font styles that fits your taste. To change fonts on your Samsung Galaxy device, navigate to the display settings in your device's system settings. In the display settings you can change the font style to any of these 5 new fonts for Android. This font pack should work on all Galaxy brand phones and will provide fonts for Samsung Galaxy 3 (S3), fonts for Samsung Galaxy 4 (S4), and fonts for Galaxy Note 3. This app will not work on developer devices, such as the Galaxy Nexus, because it does not have the FlipFont program. Please verify that your phone can change its font. Look for the font style option in the display or screen display section of your device settings. This app is not designed as fonts for root and does not require root permission to change your font, nor will it require you to restart your phone.* Also, you will be able to enjoy your fonts for texting and messaging, however the typeface used on your device will not be sent to people that you send a text message to. We love fonts and love to personalise our Android devices with unique typefaces. We hope you enjoy all of the fonts that we have collected for use on FlipFont free. Please let us know if you have any issues using a font or any suggestions on fonts that you would like to see. * Phone restart will not be required for devices running Android 3.0 or later. Devices such as the Samsung Galaxy Y and Samsung Galaxy Ace will still require a restart to apply the new font. This android application is not affiliated with FlipFont or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.

description: Can't find time to go see the Northern Lights? Now you can watch them on your phone! Northern Lights live wallpaper creates a real-time simulation of the Northern Lights, also known as the Aurora Borealis. Stars twinkle slowly in the background while the lights dance, and the pattern never repeats. The full version lets you select several different locations to watch the lights from, and allows you to choose from six different light color themes. Quality Guarantee: If for any reason you are unsatisfied with this app, please email me, and I will gladly refund your purchase. **IMPORTANT** Live wallpapers will not show up with your other apps. To apply it, press and hold a place on your current background until a menu appears then select Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers, and select it from the list.
release_text: 12/12/12: Added shooting stars! Double tap the screen to send a meteor racing across the sky, or wait for them to come down on their own! Also fixed a few graphic alignment problems, and converted all animation to be time based, rather than frame rate limited. 10/29/12: Added support for Jelly Bean. 6/4/12: Fixed a bug that caused the background to flicker when loading a new scene, as well as other minor visual issues.

description: Protect your Battle.net Account and your Blizzard games using our free Mobile Authenticator app! The app offers two factor authentication, protecting everything from your most storied World of Warcraft characters to your meticulously crafted Hearthstone decks. The authenticator app generates a unique code to use with your regular password at each login. With the Mobile Authenticator, you can rest easy knowing that your Battle.net account is more secure. Internet connection required. For more information on how to add the Battle.net Mobile Authenticator to your account, visit www.battle.net/support/article/battlenet-authenticator. Permissions: This app requires access to Photos/Media/Files so you can save a screenshot of the Serial Number and Restore Code. This makes it easier for you to restore the Battle.net Authenticator app when you get a new device or reinstall. Note: This app is not compatible with classic Battle.net games (StarCraft, Diablo II, and Warcraft III). Languages Supported: * English * Français * Deutsch * Español (Latinoamérica) * Español (Europa) * Português * Italiano * Polski * Русский * 한국어 (Korean) * 繁體中文 (Traditional Chinese) * 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese) ©2016 Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. All right reserved. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. All other trademarks referenced herein are the properties of their respective owners.
release_text: What’s New - Version 2.1 • You can easily attach your Battle.net Authenticator directly from within the app. • You can sign up for SMS Protect through the Battle.net Authenticator app. The app will prompt you to sign up if you haven’t already done so. • You can quickly restore your Authenticator by entering an SMS Protect code.
